sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tongue</radical> radical and the <kanji>tongue</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Yee-haw!
readingMnemonic: You’re sound asleep in bed when your <kanji>tongue</kanji> drops out of your mouth and you start to drool, getting saliva all over the bed <reading>sheet</reading> (<ja>した</ja>). You wake up with a soggy patch of sheet near your mouth and wipe the drool off your face. Your significant other sees the whole thing.
readingInfo: Your significant other had been watching you sleep with your tongue out for a while now, so you're super embarrassed you wet the sheets with your nasty tongue drool. You feel very judged and embarrassed.
